name: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4拒绝服务漏洞（CNVD-2025-29082）
product: ["Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2 <=1.19.5", "Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4 <=1.19.5"]
description: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4都是美国Azure Access Technology公司的一种网络门禁控制器。Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4存在拒绝服务漏洞，该漏洞是由于协议操作导致的未捕获异常引起的。攻击者可利用该漏洞导致拒绝服务。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://azure-access.com/security-advisories/
patch: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4拒绝服务漏洞（CNVD-2025-29082）的补丁
